item.title: Carls leads at PGA
item.description: Brett Carls took a three stroke lead into the final round of the PGA Championship at Whistling Straits.

item.title: Groveney Signs
item.description: New York signed leading defenseman Steve Groveney to a 2-year contract on Thursday.

item.title: Olson Out for 2 Weeks
item.description: Team officials announced that Kansas City QB Drew Olson will miss two weeks of practice due to a sprained knee.

item.title: Koke Triumphs in Malaysia
item.description: Koke won the Men's Open Division victory in the closely contested final of the Malaysian Surfing Pro Am.

item.title: Gregg Called Up
item.description: Steve Gregg was recalled to the majors after allowing two hits in six innings in his third start for the Tipton Turbines.
